title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Deaf / Hearing Loss
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Deaf / Hearing Loss              Deaf / Hearing Loss       Visitor Center   The audio tracks for the Visitor Center museum area are available in print form.  Our orientation film is open-captioned. The fiber-optic battlefield map is equipped with open-captioning.   Â     Battlefield  Transcripts are available at the Visitor Center for the Tour Road cell phone tour. Transcripts are available at the Visitor Center for the Wilkinson Trail (hiking trail) cell phone tour.
